turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi how can I help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'd like to order pizzas from Bella Luna Pizzeria. Can you help me out, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure thing, what kind of pizza did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I told her two pizzas. Are both of them medium and extra cheese? One pizza can I get meat lovers and the second pizza can I get veggie lovers pizza?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So that's 2 mediums with extra cheese, one meat lovers and the other veggie lovers which totals out to $42.99.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great your pizza will be ready for pickup in 30 minutes and you'll get the receipt via text.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you very much for your help, I appreciate it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: no problem, have a good day, bye.
